init_hook: echo 'Dapr CLI version:' $(dapr version --client-only 2>/dev/null || echo 'not initialized')
echo '  dapr init              - Initialize Dapr runtime'
echo '  dapr run --app-id myapp --app-port 8000 -- python app.py'
echo '  dapr dashboard         - Open Dapr dashboard'
echo 'üí° Create a virtual environment with: python -m venv .venv'
echo '   Then activate it with: source .venv/bin/activate'

scripts.setup-venv: python -m venv .venv && echo 'Virtual environment created. Activate with: source .venv/bin/activate'
